footer.warning: Be cautious with major news stories ‚Äî verify facts before believing or sharing so you don't get misled!

card1.title: Factchecker Library
card1.text: Here you will find training materials on information search and verification methodology, as well as original articles, interviews, and guides. The freely available texts can be downloaded for study right here, and in some cases we provide links to online libraries where you can purchase digital editions.

card2.title: A. Gorokhovsky. Fact-checking as a trend in investigative journalism
card2.text: Alexander Gorokhovsky, a Kyiv-based journalist and founder and editor-in-chief of the Bez Brekhni project, summarizes the basic methods of verifying information for all fact-checkers in his methodological guide.
card2.button: Learn to think like a fact checker

card3.title: Programmable search engines: how to improve Google search
card3.text: Even if your work does not involve searching for and verifying information, you have probably noticed that search results on major search engines are becoming less and less satisfactory. Unfortunately, this is indeed the case.
card3.button: Improve the quality of Google searches

api.title: Our tool will help you find out the truth!
api.description: Here you can objectively assess the reliability of a particular article or news item. AI will analyze a range of factors to help you form an accurate opinion about a particular news item.
api.placeholder: Enter the URL of the article or news item you want to check.

extension.title: You can also use our extension!
extension.description: We have created a special extension with functionality to check the website you are visiting. Ensure your information security with Fact Guard.

feedback.text: If you have any feedback you can leave a review on our Telegram channel.

about.title: About Us
about.who_we_are_text: Fact Guard is a project dedicated to combating disinformation and improving media literacy. We believe that in an era of information noise, everyone should be able to verify facts and think critically about the information they receive.
about.mission_text: To provide accessible tools and knowledge for identifying fakes, verifying sources, and developing critical thinking skills.

tool.title: Powerful Tool
tool.text: ‚Äî with which you can get deep research in minimal time and effort with source examples and objective AI agent assessment
